content:
Hi ESDS, Nick Wehrheim and Ken Cote are working on creating a BinderHub/JupyterHub NCAR cloud service. Could you help me help them develop the best product for our user base by telling me your:

  • favorite features from the JupyterHub on Cheyenne and Casper
  • any example workflows that show data access, worker distribution, analysis, plotting (any steps I didn't touch?)
  • and of course your headaches that you've encountered (making sure your session has ended, difficulty managing environments, etc)

Thank you for your help! I will take your responses and discuss them with the team on Friday.
